title: Andrew Sheets: Are Bonds Still a Worthwhile Investment?
description: Since last year, bonds of all stripes have seen so-so returns and high stock market correlation. Is it time to question their value as a portfolio diversifier?
itunes:title: Andrew Sheets: Are Bonds Still a Worthwhile Investment?
